entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 6.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
